name: Monkey Math
description:
A Puzzle Game With Math and Monkeys! Become the top banana!

  • Classic Mode is directly inspired by DK Jr. Math. Match the number by using arithmetic at your disposal.

  • Endless math equations to solve! Solve random addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, count the fruit, solve for X, find the prime number! Hone your mathematical skills with harder challenges and complete them in a faster time and aim to beat your high score.
    Add/Subtract

    Multiply

    And More!

  • Head to Head Play against your friends online (through Remote Play, for now) or local couch pvp to show off how quickly you can solve math equations.

Features to release during Early Access, before v1.0

  • Level system Progressively harder 'worlds' and levels to progress through.
  • More equations and math variety. Long multiplication, division, more trigonometry, etc.
  • More achievements!
  • Online head-to-head on all levels
  • More game settings to customize and tweak
  • Monkey customization (maybe hats)
